summary: HBM market projected at $85-100B in 2027 (base case ~$90B), growing at ~50% from 2026, driven by AI infrastructure demand
text_content:
Comprehensive HBM 2027 market prediction report completed. Key findings:

- Market Size 2027: $85-100 billion USD (base case: ~$90B)
- Growth trajectory: $17B (2024 actual) → $35B (2025 est.) → $60B (2026 est.) → $90B (2027 projection)
- Technology: HBM4/HBM4E will dominate with 70%+ market share
- Competition: SK Hynix (55-60%), Samsung (25-30%), Micron (15-20%)
- Primary driver: AI training and inference (65-70% of demand)
- Supply: Continued constraints through 2027 despite capacity additions
- Pricing: Premium pricing sustained due to oligopoly structure

Report based on verified 2024-2025 data from TrendForce, JPMorgan, Korea Herald, and company sources. All projections clearly identified as estimates with methodology and limitations disclosed.
instruction_to_user: Review the HBM 2027 market prediction report in HBM_2027_Market_Prediction.md. The analysis uses verified 2024-2025 data and projects forward to 2027. All sources are from publicly available analyst reports and company disclosures, with clear disclaimers that projections are estimates.
